titleStmt.title: De sectore & radio. The description and vse of the sector in three bookes. The description and vse of the cross-staffe in other three bookes. For such as are studious of mathematicall practise.
titleStmt.author: Gunter, Edmund, 1581-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones. and are to be sold by Iohn Tap at Saint Magnus corner.,

notesStmt.note: Added engr. t.-p.: The description and vse of the sector, for such as are studious of mathematicall practise. London, Printed by William Iones, 1623.
"Description and use of the cross-staffe" lacks special t.p. but has separate paging and register.
Imperfect: faded, with loss of text; Q₁₋₂ lacking.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
